name: Nixa
description:
Nixa is a web development firm, focusing on complex and challenging projects as well as failing projects takeover (with risk management).
We serve the best digital agencies and software companies that need help and extra capacity with their daily programming, infrastructure or UX / UI design.
Nixa innovates by developing practical solutions in order to accelerate your web project’s development process. We’ve built our brand on quick execution, impeccable customer service, and transparency.
Not only are the tools we build and use brilliant, our team is too – featuring an impressive roster of the most creative and respected programmers, designers, developers and strategic partners in the industry. We hire geniuses, and that's why with us on your side; all of your projects will succeed.
Our mission is to fast-track agencies' web projects by giving them the tools they need for high-quality development. We focus on sales growth and on optimizing every project's return on investment.
